quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the retail business of health and beauty products. The Company operates its business through four segments. The Retail segment is mainly engaged in the retail business of health and beauty products, supermarkets, consumer electronics and electrical appliances, foreign wines, perfumes and cosmetics, as well as engages in the manufacturing and distribution of bottled water and beverages. The Telecommunication segment mainly provides integrated telecommunications and digital services. The Ports and Related Service segment is mainly engaged in the operation of ports and terminals, and the provision of port-related logistics services. The Infrastructure segment has diversified investments in energy, transportation, water treatment, waste management, waste-to-energy, building services infrastructure and infrastructure-related business. The Company also engages in finance and investment activities.
